mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(diseaseName) FROM patient_cases_information WHERE diseaseName NOT LIKE '%未分型%'

SELECT p.`year` AS dataYear,pci.diseaseName AS disease,p.sex AS sex,COUNT(p.sex) AS num FROM patient_information p JOIN patient_cases_information pci ON (p.`year` = pci.`year` AND p.cardID = pci.cardID)
AND pci.diseaseName NOT LIKE '疟疾（未分型）'
AND p.address LIKE '%${_parameter}%'
GROUP BY p.sex , pci.diseaseName , pci.`year` ORDER BY pci.`year`,pci.diseaseName,p.sex;

SELECT p.`year` AS `year`,pci.diseaseName AS diseaseName,p.career AS career,COUNT(p.career) AS patientNum FROM patient_information p JOIN patient_cases_information pci ON p.`year` = pci.`year` AND p.cardID = pci.cardID
AND pci.diseaseName NOT LIKE '疟疾（未分型）' AND p.career NOT LIKE '不详'
AND p.address LIKE '%${_parameter}%'
GROUP BY p.career,pci.`year`,pci.diseaseName ORDER BY p.`year`,pci.diseaseName,p.career

SELECT p.`year` AS `year`,pci.diseaseName AS disease, CASE WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 0 and 9 THEN '0-9' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 10 and 19 THEN '10-19' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 20 and 29 THEN '20-29' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 30 and 39 THEN '30-39' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 40 and 49 THEN '40-49' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 50 and 59 THEN '50-59' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 60 and 69 THEN '60-69' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 70 and 79 THEN '70-79' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN '80-89' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 90 and 99 THEN '90-99' ELSE '>99' END AS ageGroup ,COUNT(p.cardID) AS patientNum FROM patient_information p JOIN patient_cases_information pci ON pci.`year` = p.`year` AND pci.cardID = p.cardID
AND pci.diseaseName NOT LIKE '疟疾（未分型）'
AND p.address LIKE '%${_parameter}%'
GROUP BY CASE WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 0 and 9 THEN '0-9' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 10 and 19 THEN '10-19' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 20 and 29 THEN '20-29' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 30 and 39 THEN '30-39' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 40 and 49 THEN '40-49' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 50 and 59 THEN '50-59' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 60 and 69 THEN '60-69' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 70 and 79 THEN '70-79' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN '80-89' WHEN p.`year`-YEAR(p.birthday)+1 BETWEEN 90 and 99 THEN '90-99' ELSE '>99' END,p.`year`,pci.diseaseName ORDER BY p.`year`,pci.diseaseName,ageGroup;
